mapApi.label: Google Places API Key
mapApi.placeholder: Enter your Google Places API key
mapApi.helper: This API key will be used for all location-based features including Geo Ranking and map services.
mapApi.howToTitle: How to generate Google Places API key

steps.1: Note - You must enable Billing for Google Project.
steps.3: Click the project drop-down and select or create the project for which you want to add an API key.
steps.4: From Dashboard → Go to APIs overview → Click on Library → Enable Maps JavaScript API & Enable Places API.
steps.5: After that Click the menu button and select APIs & Services → Credentials.
steps.6: On the Credentials page, Create credentials Dropdown - Select API Key Option.
steps.7: A dialog will appear showing your newly created API key — copy the key.
steps.8: Use or Paste generated key under Geo Ranking → Manage Key tab. (One-time activity -Only First use of GEO Ranking Check).
steps.9: Once you have added a key it will be used for all of your listings and no more need to generate a separate key for each GMB listing.
